content: one behind the other 30 sts on 2nd dpn and 15 sts on 3rd dpn join for working in the graft the sts together as follows insert the yarn needle through round being careful not to twist work 6 rnds in st st the first st on the front dpn as if to purl then through the first st on the back dpn as if to knit picot round * k2tog yo repeat from * to end of round * insert the yarn needle through the first front st as if to knit and work 6 rnds in st st slide it off the dpn then through the second front st as if to purl and leave it on insert the yarn needle through the first back st as next round fold hem up to the inside * k2tog by inserting the if to purl and slide it off then through the second back st as if to right-hand needle through the first st on the left-hand needle and knit and leave it on repeat from * until all sts have been grafted the first st of the cast-on edge repeat from * around securing the hem in place abbreviations decrease decrease d or decreasing leg dpn s double-pointed needle s work in st st until sock measures 6 from beginning or desired k knit length k2tog knit 2 stitches together p purl heel flap p2tog purl 2 stitches together rearrange sts by dividing the 30 sts on 2nd dpn onto 2 needles round s round s and leave for instep knit the 15 sts from 1st dpn onto the end of rs right side 3rd dpn for heel sl slip ssk slip 2 sts one at a time knitwise slip these 2 sts back to the work back and forth on the 30 heel sts as follows left-hand needle and knit the 2 slipped sts together through row 1 ws sl 1 purl to end of row turn the back loop row 2 rs * sl 1 k1 repeat from * to end of row turn st s stitch es st st stockinette stitch repeat row 1 and 2 fourteen more times or until heel flap ws wrong side measures 2 ending with a rs row yo yarn over vivace socks by elizabeth sullivan ~ 1 ~ www sweetpaprikadesigns com
